website_summaries.verdict: The ultra-slim design makes this pack a great option for those looking for a sleek and professional style.
pros: Despite its slim design, the bag works as a super organizer
It comes with 17 different storage spaces and compartments
An external USB charging port is built into the bag
Hidden laptop compartment offers extra security
cons: Seams have a tendency to become loose

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST Tech Backpack for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I explain everything in my video review above (It's also uploaded to my youtube: PandasCanEatYourTech)
customer_reviews.author: nick snider

customer_reviews.title: love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled to China with this backpack and absolutely loved it. i was a bit worried it would only fit my 15'' computer however it also easily fits my 17''!!!!! It comes with a lock, an easy accessible charging area, and tons of storage areas. I may need to buy another of these for my wife since she now hates her bag compared to mine lol
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my daughters who are starting high school. They found these and thought they looked neat, especially with the charging component. I have to say these are the coolest backpacks ever. We even had them monogrammed. They seem very durable which I like bc they will be throwing them around all day :).
customer_reviews.author: katie adams

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BACKPACK!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BACKPACK!! This backpack is perfect for me!! It's lightweight and compact and it's large enough. I have been searching for a good backpack and have tried many but this is the only one that has met ALL of my needs. The ergonomic support and wide straps are GREAT! I also LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the security compartment for my laptop. I really do love this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyMi

customer_reviews.title: An Ideal multi-purpose backpack, except for one small omission
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent backpack. Perfectly sized for city/week-end travel/business travel. After nearly a year's use, it still looks like new. After being in a rain storm, everything within remains dry. Lots of pockets to keep things organized. There is one compartment tall enough to place several files, and a 15" laptop, so it is good for work. Several compartments will accommodate a 11"tablet. There is only one fault (not bad enough to not buy it): There is no inside hook or loop for keys. You drop your keys in the bottom, and have to grope through the "stuff: to find them. Bad for commuters.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: So much storage w/o making it look fat!
customer_reviews.text: Its really great! It holds so much and has so many places to put everything you could need to pack. Its so compact that even loading it up with everything still has the backpack looking slim. Thats awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Julie E Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: So far this backpack is fantastic! I do have a negative point and warning ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this backpack is fantastic! I do have a negative point and warning for people. I'll put that at the end. I say so far because I've purchased a couple backpacks (different brand & seller) that ripped a month or two after purchasing. This backpack is great though. Good storage, variety of pockets, strong material, comfortable, etc. So, I'm the laptop pocket is in an interesting spot. It's behind the shoulder straps. Dont mind that but it bulges into the main pocket/pouch of the backup. Also warning! Do NOT get this if your backpack is bigger than a 15.6 otherwise it will not fit. My laptop is a 15.6 and it just fits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is as waterproof as a regular backpack, I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is as waterproof as a regular backpack, I bought it for this waterproof feature, and today was a regular rainy day where I live, the truth is that the backpack on the outside was dry quickly, but when I went to get my external disk, everything inside was wet, my books, my external hard drive, my laptop, everything, I'm very angry about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality for such a low price. It is extremely strong quality, water resistant and looks great. I have used it every day for a year and there are no signs of wear whatsoever. I would certainly recommend this to anyone in the market for a laptop/school bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Denekamp

customer_reviews.title: 100% NOT WATERPROOF OR RESISTANT!
customer_reviews.text: 100% NOT Waterproof or even water resistant!!!!!! My daughter plays soccer and runs track, so I bought her this bag to keep her school required chromebook in. I made sure the bag I was purchasing, was waterproof in case she was caught in the rain with it. They have to keep their bags with them for practice as it begins immediately after school ends. Today, she was caught in the rain and her bag is ABSOLUTELY SOAKED INSIDE AND OUT!!!!!! I am LIVID!
customer_reviews.author: K-Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Material Great, Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I bought it to hold my Laptop for school. I am older so I love the back support that it provides. It is very comfortable, the material is good quality and the size is perfect. I also love the external charge feature.
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Except one little thing
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is exactly what it says it is. Slim, great quality, padding on the straps so my shoulders aren't killing me. My only complaint is that the lockable zipper for the laptop pocket is not actually lockable. I attached a picture so you see what I mean. For this reason, I docked a star on the review. However, because you can only unzip it and get my computer out of there if I'm not wearing the backpack and if you flip the straps over, it's not the worst thing in the world. Still would've liked to get the product as it should have been though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Good back pack but gives me neck pain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack in terms of storage and keeping my items safe. However, it gives me a lot of neck pain because of the way the top strap is setup. Other backpacks have a loop for hanging that is stitched to the backpack itself. But with this design the loop for hanging goes between the two straps of the backpack and it causes me a lot of neck pain and headaches. Hopefully they can fix this design in the future. I would return the backpack if I could but by the time I realized my neck pain and headaches were caused by the backpack my return window had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton

customer_reviews.title: It's a backpack, but is it worth $35? NO
customer_reviews.text: Was really not a fan of this backpack, weird fleece like material, gets hot quickly in the summer, reusable waterbottle doesn't fit in the side pockets (it's too wide) basically anything larger than a normal 16 oz water bottle will have trouble fitting into the side compartment. this is a generic product that you'd find on Canal street for $10. I got ripped off by this, sadly lol..
customer_reviews.author: Jei Mei

customer_reviews.title: Good Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It has enough room to put binders and notebooks in and also feels comfortable on the back. There is a an extra small buckle on the side towards the back of backpack that’s supposed to help lock your laptop in the laptop sleeve area. 10/10 would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Galactic_Bubble

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: My 15.6" laptop fits in the laptop sleeve perfectly. Very very roomy. My laptop, headphones case, headphones, Xbox controller, laptop charger, battery pack, phone battery, watch charger, notebook, pen, USB drive all fit excellent in it, with plenty of room to add more stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wright

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Clothes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek bag with lots of space! Updated Review - I love how spacious the bag is. It’s compact and perfect for work BUT it ruined soooo many of my clothes! The black strap that hangs below the shoulders is extremely abrasive to all kinds of clothing. I ended up ruining 3-4 things before I realized that this bag was causing it. Horrible!!
customer_reviews.author: masterblaster82

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this backpack, but it presses on my upper back and neck - very painful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the organization pockets in this backpack; seriously they are awesome. I didn't need to use my own pen/pencil pouch because it is so great. HOWEVER, and it is a big however, I had to stop using this backpack because it is painful. That little top part that connects the straps pushes into my upper back & neck. I have tried changing the length of the straps to see if I can get it to lay flat. I cannot. :( If it weren't for that little piece attaching them, it would be a 5 star review. Unfortunately, I can't get my money back. Don't make my mistake, get something else that won't cause you pain.
customer_reviews.author: Math Teach

customer_reviews.title: unless you like your backpack resting behind your knees I guess
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought was defective. The straps were set up wrong making the backpack impossible to use, unless you like your backpack resting behind your knees I guess. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Burnt Toast

customer_reviews.title: I honestly really love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I honestly really love this backpack, it is so lightweight, easy to carry around, at the best part is that it has multiple storages. BUT, the only reason why this backpack gets a 3 star instead of a 4 or 5 is that the fabric of the backpack rips easily. I've only used it for about a week and it started to tear around the edges of storage pockets, and I only carry around a travel pouch, my 13" MacBook Pro, and my pencil case. I'm really sad about it, to be honest, hopefully, they can fix this flaw. It really is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and have had it a little while now. Very happy. What makes this stand out is having a dedicated laptop pocket in the back, and behind the straps. Something about this design is nice and works well. I flip the straps over the bad to access my laptop and if feels very natural. I feel this gives some added security if in public. The other pockets eorkngrwat and have a good layout. The design and look of the bag is clean as asthetic. I have not used the charging function, and feel the location of where the power port goes could be better, but do plan on still using it further down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew  Harnden

customer_reviews.title: Grate bag,!
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack for my college classes and it works grate! About a month after I bought it there was a massive rain storm and the inside of the bag stayed completely dry. Its not too bulky but it still holds everything I need and a few things I don’t. I can comfortably Cary my laptop, tablet, over ear headphones, a three ring binder, a jacket and all other little things like my phone/ wallet. The only thing I might change is having the key holder possibly on the strap for eas of access. Over all a very nice bag especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lillyannah R.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Bag EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO HAPPY with this purchase!! This bag is EXACTLY what I've been looking for! It is VERY SLIM yet fits EVERYTHING I need. Fits my laptop very nicely in a separate compartment for it which is UNDER the back straps (so no one can sneak up on you and steal it while you're walking). It is water-resistant. I carry my laptop, a clipboard-case, insurance policies, pens, office stuff, and a charger, and it still looks slim! When I take a flight, it fits everything I would need in an airplane! I can't say enough good things about this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Batista

customer_reviews.title: Great commuter back pack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use this as a daily commuter bag. The laptop pocket on the back fits my slim Dell E7450 well, but not sure how it would do with larger laptops. The side pockets stretch to hold a small umbrella or water bottle with ease. The additional 2 pockets in the main part of the backpack have smaller compartments and pockets for cell phones, cables, ipads, etc. The exterior dimensions of this bag are pretty small and it's great for a smaller framed person. The bag itself weighs only a few oz.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duvall

customer_reviews.title: NO PROTECTION FROM RAIN!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because it was 'WATER RESISTANT". All of my daughter's college books and computer got soaked when there was an unexpected downpour. Without getting into the semantics of what water resistant means....if it will offer no protection -- SAY NOTHING!! The statement water resistant is not expected to be waterproof....but should offer some type of limited protection to get to shelter. Luckily computer was a ThinkPad 9thats OK. Had to replace one text...others are damaged. Should be 1\2 star for its color.
customer_reviews.author: Clarkus

customer_reviews.title: A nice back pack for your gadgets.
customer_reviews.text: Is a good looking back pack and has a very nice layout for your gardets a jacket and is comfortable and the materials are really solid and they seem to last , however there is an issue with the USB charging port..even if you connect a power bank with quick charge , the USB wire charges at normal speeds ,another issue (and that's on me) is that the laptop compartment is for slim laptops like a Dell XPS , mackbooks and Lenovo yoga, gaming laptops won't fit in , anyway i am happy with this back pack!
customer_reviews.author: alex c

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17" Dell Laptop. It is made of very sturdy material. Has LOTS of pockets !! Straps are comfortable and easy to adjust. The overall product is well designed and durable. Worth the money. It makes moving around with my laptop and books easy and comfortable. CON- The base of the bag is not padded. so if your bag should slip or fall your device can be damaged. I recommend folding a face towel and placing it on the inside of the base to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these backpacks last fall, and had to return it for a sticking zipper. I got a replacement, which I just opened to use on a trip. The USB port is so defective that I cannot connect a usb cable.I like the backpack, and wish there were not these problems associated with it. So I bought the backpack for the convenience of the charging port, and now I cannot use it. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A.

customer_reviews.title: too long for short people
customer_reviews.text: While the backpack is not too long in it's body, it hangs longer on your back due to the construction of the handle with the straps. Add 2.5 inches to the 17 inch length to get the back length. This is probably a bit too long for most women under 5'4" to fit comfortably on their back, even though it is marketed as a woman's bag. It is made well, but I'm going to have to return it and take the hit of paying $7.87 to see it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed backpack! The material is thick and durable and the zippers run smoothly. I love that the outside is clean and minimal in appearance, but the inside has plenty of space and pockets for storage. The side pockets for water bottles are big and stretch out to securely fit large thermal tumblers, which many backpacks fail to do these days. The straps are a little wide for my body frame so they slightly dig into my shoulders, but I'm a petite woman so this probably isn't a problem for most people. I use this as an every day carry bag into the office. As long as I pack it light, I don't have issues with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Mae

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, solid, and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This backpack seems very well made, is sold at an impressively low price, and has an amazing number of pockets and compartments. In fact, my only problem is figuring out which pocket I've put something in; it would help if they were a little more differentiated visually. I also bought a separate laptop sleeve to use with this -- I keep it in the laptop compartment, so that I can quickly remove the sleeve and laptop for situations where I don't need the whole backpack. It might be good if this came with a matching sleeve, or at least if a matching one was sold separately. Overall, however, it's a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect day pack for the average cubicle dweller.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this bag. It holds my hp 1030 g3 perfectly. Like it was made for it. The pockets are ample and well laid out. There is a logical spot for lots of cables and adapters and such. The bag is slim and small, just what I wanted. The zippers are robust and the pulls feel good. I've bought a battery pack and I'll try that out when it gets here. Traveling with this bag would be so-so as it's pretty small. The only complaint is that there is not much in the way of back padding or airflow when the bag is on. That said, it's great for this excursions between the car and office.
customer_reviews.author: Chad F

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything I wanted, it’s slim but holds everything I need for work including room for my lunch bag. It’s light and comfortable. It seems well made and durable though I haven’t had it for very long. I haven’t tried the charging port yet but that’s not the main reason I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: The height of this backpack is perfect (got the 15.6 inch) to fit all my school materials (laptop, binders, folders), but it is not wide enough so everything is very squeezed in and sometimes it's hard to get stuff out. Due to this I can't fit in a lot of stuff. Also the side water bottle carriers are very tight so a portable water bottle won't really fit, but those plastic ones you can throw away will probably fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I commute with it every day, and it's great for the train. I can fit my laptop, and lunch with no issues. It's compact, but spacious enough for the daily commuter. The quality of the fabric and the zippers are pretty good. The way the straps are designed makes it very comfortable on your shoulders and back. One thing that I don't like is the USB charging port. It has a little USB cable inside the I can't take out (unless I cut it). I don't use it, and I should be able to remove it. Anyhow, it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Arikur

customer_reviews.title: Best Business Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack to replace my Janpsport. I wanted something a little more sleek and professional looking. I love how it has dual outside pockets, so I can put my umbrella in one and my water bottle in the other for the commute. The hidden pockets on the inside are just the right size and amount for my thumb drives, mouse, and other electronic devices. I usually carry my laptop (15 inches), wire bound planner, daily reader, toiletry bag, my pencil case, and a small wallet. And I still have room. I'm thinking about purchasing another one just for travel to match my carryon bag.
customer_reviews.author: Deex2

customer_reviews.title: Great bag - a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love the pockets, especially the back laptop pocket, keeps everything nice and safe (I can even fit my travel monitor so larger laptops should fit). the bag is narrow so you can't fit anything to bulky but perfect for papers and folders. side pockets are great for your mouse and a water bottle. The only thing it's missing my last bag had a pocket perfect size for a wallet, which was great for travel - I fly a lot.
customer_reviews.author: kiko

customer_reviews.title: Roomy with a slim profile
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It has all the pockets I need and the compartments are large and roomy, but the pack all together doesn’t take up a lot of space. I’m using it for my regular commute to work, it has a compartment that I can slip my laptop inside of when I need to, and I’ll be using it for an overnight trip in a few days. It fits everything I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: ALKD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and well made
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the backpack daily for about 2 weeks now and really like it. The compartment are just right for what I need to carry : laptop , charger, a book or two and some Cables. Stitching is well done and material seems very durable. Zippers are also very good and operate smoothly. Only have a couple of small gripes: the side pockets are not big enough to hold larger water bottles and the built-in Cable for charging should be accessible from the "front" Compartment as this is where I Carry the charger/ battery. All-in-All, quite satisfied and would recommend this backpack highly.
customer_reviews.author: Kirti Parmar

customer_reviews.title: Ten Days in Italy
customer_reviews.text: recently took this on a ten day trip to Rome, Florence, and Venice. very well made, secure and stylish. was carried on to all planes with no issues. brought into the colosseum and forum just fine. only place that had an absolute exclusion on back packs was doge palace. I am super picky and would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: bms231

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Amazing looking. Stylish. the price is good for the quality. I have a laptop, screwdriver kit, some camera equipment and lot of cables. This bag is Spacious enough to hold everything and it is very ergonomic so it doesn't burden your shoulder even with lot of weight. The only thing i miss is cable compartments. as a Tech reviewer, i Carry lot of cables with me and this bag lack any compartment to organize the cables but thats only what i want other wise its an amazing bag. i bought one and recommended to a friend and he got one , both colors grey and black look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: The Pixel Plays

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am SO Disappointed. After much searching, i selected this product for it's features. One of which was "Upgraded fabric with excellent texture, featured with durable tear-resistant...". However, in less than 1 month, one of the straps is literally coming apart at the seams! I've only traveled to/from work and haven't even had the opportunity to travel with it yet! Totally bummed! (I would upload photos but that option doesn't seem to be working)
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Backpack is great but the included USB cable for the port is trash!!
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this backpack a little over a year & it's holding up very good. I have taken it to a few of my vacation trips already. Comes in very clutch. My only issue is the USB cable that comes with it to attach to your power bank. It only supports up to 2.5 watts (5 volts, 0.5 amps). Extremely disappointing. Most phones charge from 10 to 15 watts. Other then that the backpack holds up really good. I'd give it 5 stars but the cable is garbage & it's hard to frying another that would fit in the port.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Like this backpack. Compact and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my 15” laptop and all its accessories. There is a place to the back where I can place my folders with documents, drawings, etc. It is thin but a bit expandable. Nice addition. My phone charger is inside the bag with the cord charger attachment, I can carry my phone in my pant pocket without me having to carry the charger outside the bag. While traveling overseas, getting in and out if vehicles, I could tighten or loosen up the straps very easy. This is my first compact backpack. After reasearching (size, reviews, price, quality and oracticality) I am glad I selected this backpack. Everything is holding together still. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mv

customer_reviews.title: Well built and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Do you need to travel with your 'office'? This is a great way to do so. Looks good, well built, lots of ways to organize things. One very minor detail that I LOVE - the strap on the harness where you can hang your sunglasses! The only thing that kept it from 5 stars - the water bottle carriers on the side are uselessly small, and the access to the laptop compartment can be a bit awkward as the shoulder harnesses get in the way - but this is also a safety feature as it makes it difficult for someone to just lift your laptop out of your bag, so it's not that bad in that respect. Great bang-for-buck.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Functional, attractive, happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this so haven't taken it for a "test run," but upon preliminary inspection & checking to make sure the charge unit would work (I did not use a battery pack, but tested directly from a wall socket), it seems to be a great backpack! I will try to update after using it more. Amazon-quick, wow-online shopping made so GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: No sleeve for laptop, minimal padding on bottom of bag.
customer_reviews.text: Travel, back and forth to work. Overall, fine. This bag has a "sleeve", but it is just a thin layer of material, and does not fit my 9" x 13 " laptop. Useful for a few loose paper s maybe, but even 8" x 1 1" pad of paper doesn't. On the plus side, I am a 5 ' 1" fall slightly built woman, and it does fit my frame, and is comfortable enough for my 1 mile walk to work. Looks professional enough to carry into a meeting. note: water bottle holders are very slim - won't accommodate my 2 1/2" Contingo.
customer_reviews.author: moss

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Shows Major Wear After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Overall the style and size of the bag is what I expected and wanted. However in only two months of normal daily use the attachment point of the shoulder straps is starting to pull out. This is not a good sign in my opinion for the overall quality of the construction and stitching in particular. It may be a weakness only in the grab handle which I use to hang the bag during the day. Regardless, this amount of wear in two months is unacceptable and I now think of this bag as having a 6-12 month lifespan under normal use.
customer_reviews.author: K Green

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Slim (fits a Macbook Pro 15", an iPad Pro 9.7", an iPad Mini, as well as an accordion folder) -Good texture/feel -Looks great -Good amount of pockets all over and inside. The sides expand to fit bigger bottles. Cons: -Straps could use a little more padding to make it feel more durable -Bottom part should be cushioned a little more to prevent damage to laptops should it hit the floor 10/10 Would Recommend for a Slim Backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Sirx Tj

customer_reviews.title: The backpack looks small but it holds a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is true to its descriptions. I love the semi hard construction of the backpack. The material is durable and the zippers are so smooth and well made. The compartments in the backpack are specially designed for ipad and laptop. I love all the small pockets inside the backpack. When I carry it on my back, the weight distributes evenly on my back. I really love this backpack. I can put a lot of stuff in it and yet everything stays organized and in place.
customer_reviews.author: mimi key

customer_reviews.title: i LOVE this backpack--lightweight, lots of space & compartments, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my laptop and it's slim, lightweight, but sturdy! Lots of pockets for my notebooks or pens/cords/business cards. I like the unique rectangle shaped handle that allows you to pick up the backpack nicely off the ground. The zipper for the ultra slim laptop compartment has a hook so that you can use a pad lock to secure it. **If you're looking for a water bottle compartment then this may NOT be the backpack for you. The water bottle compartment is VERY tight. It cannot fit a standard disposable water bottle, much less a contigo travel mug.**
customer_reviews.author: Crober

customer_reviews.title: Great daily bag
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for over two years and I love it! It's compact & sleek & I feel organized & ready to go with it. The pockets and compartments are great for being always on the go (chargers, chapsticks, multi-tool, neosporin, pens, pencils, sunglasses,....all the essentials have their spot). I love the laptop compartment, especially how it's under the shoulder straps, I feel like my laptop is well protected. After two years of traveling, numerous odd jobs, etc etc, it's still holding strong. It's got some stains, which is more than par for the course given what I've put it through, but no real signs of it wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: eso

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and well-designed
customer_reviews.text: Can't rave enough about this backpack, very roomily fits my 15" laptop, remaining pockets can fit enough for a backpacking trip, the weight distribution is incredible, the loops for adjusting the straps are super convenient, and it's just overall attractive and comfortable to carry! Just wish I'd had this backpack in college for heavy textbooks! Will update my review after the upcoming backpacking trip for which it was purchased to see how it holds up to wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack.. Not only is it solid.. it looks expensive n feels expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laptop section fabric on inner edge of zipper snags easily...
customer_reviews.text: Back has plenty pockets just wish they hadn't used mesh for one of them since sharp ended objects poke through such as pens, etc. Furthermore, I have had the bag only a months, and the zipper to the laptop section got snagged on the inner fabric (pictured) which rendered the zipper completely useless and broken as attempting to unam resulted in zipper tooth damage. This is a significant design flaw as a different fabric would have release easier, or had there been no extra fabric placed there would have been ideal. My bag is now not nearly as functional. I have had a few backpack in my day, and I must say, this is a first for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Sum

customer_reviews.title: Handy size...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, handy size... but I don't find it comfortable as a backpack, perhaps because of the design and shape--it just doesn't seem to fit well. It is easy to carry by the top "handle" but slips off if I try to wear it on one shoulder. One other minor issue is that the zipper to the main compartment is hard to manage, partly because it's designed to be water resistant. So there are some trade-offs. It is, however, solid enough that I feel my laptop/tablet and accessories are well-protected. Good price/value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, slim and fits everything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple color, a beautiful aubergine, dark enough to disguise any dirt and red enough to still stand out. The material is proven to be waterproof, the zippers are very strong, with a double one where you store your laptop. Even packed full it looks slim and fits so much! I highly recommend it for the busy nomad professional that has too many offices to work from.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: My search for the perfect backpack is over!
customer_reviews.text: This may perhaps be one of the greatest backpacks I have ever owned! It's a perfect balance between having a slim profile and enough space to hold everything I need. It's got the perfect number of pockets: 1 main pocket for my keys, headphones and other "always" stuff, 1 laptop pocket which perfectly fits my 15" MacBook pro, and 2 larger pockets, one for books/notesbooks/etc, the other for all the "junk" I need to carry with me, but don't use all the time (chargers, lotion, meds, etc). If it came in more colors, it would be worth 6 six stars. I am very, very happy with this purchase after about 2 months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Travis V

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful backpack. The pockets are thick and seem to be of great quality. Plenty of pockets and space. I used it on a trip and it fits well under a plane seat completely full. The customer service is top notch. I actually gave them a bad review because of a misunderstanding on my part. They went above and beyond to correct my misunderstanding. Which is unheard of in most situations. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, perfect for plane travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. We travel pretty frequently and he usually brings along a huge backpack and a bunch of different pouches to hold various cords and things on the plane. I loved the idea of a sleek bag that had designated pockets for everything, and the charging port seemed like a cool bonus. Well thankfully, hubs felt the same way :) He loves the bag and we’ve already got one trip under our belts using it. The charging port was handy and he was super organized. Not to mention it’s sleek and looks really cool. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: CA gal in TX

customer_reviews.title: terrible back pack super low quality
customer_reviews.text: Its been two years with it now and just now making this review. After 2 WEEKS. TWO! The stitches started to brake in two areas shown in the photos. And had to settle with my broke backpack until now because I was in a very long trip. I have never seen something break so fast and so easily with almost no use. There is nothing like the feeling of sitting down on your plane sit to your destination with the broken backpack you specially purchased for that trip... the thin broke before I even left the country damn....
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Very Professional Looking
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - I bought as a gift for my daughter that was going off to college. She will be working with computer security and wants to look professional. This backpack is also lightweight and had plenty of room for her laptop. It is not a huge backpack, but it is the perfect size if you are carrying a laptop and items needed for class while commuting on a train - you don't want to be weighed down or carry anything bulky in the crowds. This backpack was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: heyyogirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, slim, good weight distribution
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this backpack for about 1+ years and it has no damage AT ALL. Fabric is very thick. Nothing got wet with light rain. I carrry my laptop, textbooks, and a tablet with no problem. The weight distribution is great and it looks slim and sharp. The only thing I can complain about is the color. It looks a bit washed out it’s not totally black but I don’t mind it all that much. It is limited in how much you can fit in it. If you want to fit more than a laptop and 2 textbooks it might look bulky/not be able to fit. If it had a front chest clippy thing it would be perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty satisfied with the product but it is NOT water resistant as it states in the headline one of the 2 reasons why I bought it. But! Its perfect for a good size laptop my work laptop fits perfectly in the laptop pocket and is very comfortable against my back makes the laptop feel lighter than it actually is my old backpack didnt have a laptop slot so it made my bag feel like a ton of bricks overall good rating but really wish it was water resistant as it states
customer_reviews.author: amgold253

customer_reviews.title: Great color!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and affordable! We ordered a grey for a diaper bag and my teen ended up falling in love with how comfy it was and stole it for her school backnoack so I ordered a dark black one for my diaper bag! Many pockets and breathable! Our new favorite bags
customer_reviews.author: JakeTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuting!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a backpack before and it did not work out for me - weight distribution, the way it "fit" me, the fact it was basically one big bag with pockets on the outside. This backpack really works - places for everything and it sit high on my back, the top right at my shouldblades, which is the way I like it. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a good commuting bag. I've seen 2 other people with the same bag on my travels to and from the office, so some already know how good it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday needs
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack! I use it for everyday items. Never fails it seems at the end of my day I have more to carry in that I took to work that day. I put items in here I need to keep with me in case I need them. Handy for throwing my lunch bag in and a water bottle on the side. The water bottle pouch is a bit snug, idk how people fit coffee cups in there, but it works for what I need it for! Love the slim design and look of it.
customer_reviews.author: MC Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for the money
customer_reviews.text: Likes: comfortable to wear fully loaded, good organization, looks nice. I use this every day instead of a purse. It is more casual but not so bad that I look like a student when I go to work. Dislikes: water bottle/umbrella holders are small. You’ll never fit a 32 oz bottle there. I can stuff an 18 oz bottle. It’s difficult if bag is full though. Lining material feels cheap and zippers are not high quality (although no major problems with them so far). For the money, this is a great backpack. Recommended, despite the lower quality feel.
customer_reviews.author: LalaLand

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop backpack with tons of space
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite backpack! I have 2 large (screens are 15.6", with a 0.5-inch "border" around it) laptops, one personal and one for work. Only one fits in the back, laptop-specific area, but the other fits nicely in the main compartment. I still have room for notbooks, a textbook, and my chargers/headphones. It manages to still have a nice sleek shape. The material is water resistant, but not water proof. You may still need an umbrella or other protection if its raining hard. However, if your laptop is in the back pocket against your back, it does have extra protection due to the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack worked perfect for travel. It’s fits PERFECTLY under an airplane seat. Almost as if it were made with that in mind. Seems to be great quality, much better quality and durability than jansport for sure. I used it as a carry on and as a diaper throughout a trip and it was excellent. I am now using it as my college backpack and it is perfect for it. Not too big and bulky, but still big enough hold my textbook, laptop, binder, water bottle, wallet, etc. Really great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Megatron528

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the back
customer_reviews.text: I travel every week for work and need something that will make life easier for me, but sadly this bag doesn't do that. It's not comfy on the back like a bag pack should be, and my back starts hurting very quickly with this. I don't have this problem with other bag packs so sadly I will have to switch this one out! I wish they paid more attention to ergonomics! Also, I don't think it has enough space, but that's perspective. I have had this for 6 months almost, and it's time to retire it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! The padding in the arm straps are comfortable, almost like a gel foam that provides cushion when carrying backpack. There are enough pockets to meet your needs. And I appreciate the charger - it comes in handy! But make sure to buy battery charger which is sold separately. I have the purple backpack and bring it to work (professional environment) and the color is not overwhelming! Good quality material. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Great Professional Look!
customer_reviews.text: This bag itself was very light weight. It has GREAT organzation on the inside. Looking forward to carrying it as a woman as a professional backpack for all but the most formal of meetings where i will go back to my traditional laptop one shoulder bag. Great product, this is the second tigernu/kopak purchase I've made and been impressed with both bags. Here's hoping for long term quality on this fabulous bag!! Update. Multiple compliments on how professional it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great day bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag in my option looks great, i like how i can but my laptop in the back section for easy access, it would have been nice for a little more padding on the bottom part as when i put the bag down forgetting my laptop is inside it does hit the ground harder than i would like. The main part of the bag in large enough for gym shoes and a change of clothes, the two side sections in use for coffee / water bottle are great. Overall i like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Keir

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since early October. Got to say I loved this back pack. With my Samsung tablet, dell laptop, Switch, battery pack, and some cables the whole thing still felt comfortable traveling around and going through the airport. To and from work I’d usually only have my tablet and switch and it was nice and light. Now the pouch that the tablet sits is ripping at the seams and some of the other pockets are starting to fall apart. Sucks, but was good while it lasted at least
customer_reviews.author: Jasen Zel

customer_reviews.title: great backpack, no quality assurance.
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately, the usb port on this backpack is unusable. i tried for about 10 minutes to plug in a usb cable and gave up. refer to picture. the backpack is nice besides that. im trying to justify if i want to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: love all the pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love this backback. I work as a substitute teacher and have no permanent home at the school, so I must carry everything with me. The slim design is more dignified than the kids' bulky backbacks. There is plenty of room for the book I am reading, the page I am coloring and the color pencils. There are pockets for pencils/pens and other small items. The side pocket is the perfect size for a water bottle (even a large one) and misc stuff in the other one. The straps are long and easily adjustable as well as being comfortable. I have not used the pocket in the back, but it is a great size for folders or important papers.
customer_reviews.author: KatLen124

customer_reviews.title: Causes back ache, needs better weight distribution
customer_reviews.text: Great features, fits everything well, but gave me a back ache. My purse backpack from target carrying a similar load (chrome book and purse stuff) doesn't hurt my back. I have a large frame and tend to handle weight fine if well distributed
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Slim and padded!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slim, padded laptop backpack for grad school. I have a small laptop (I believe 11 inches) and it fits with so much space! The bag is light, padded, and super slim. I only just got it, but so far so good! Time will tell how it holds up, but it wasn't very expensive so I'm not expecting perfection, just something to get me to and from the library. It's pretty great so far! And not overwhelming size-wise (I'm approx. 5'1"). I carry my laptop, some pens, and a few light notebooks and it was easy on my back. Would definitely recommend! I got it in black and it's very sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and slim but can carry a lot
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has held up well over the last couple months of daily commuting. It still looks brand new, is comfortable, holds everything I need it to, and can still be easily taken off and placed between my feet on the subway (because wearing a backpack on your back on the subway is a cardinal sin). The only downside is that the straps are a bit scratchy and irritated my arms while wearing short sleeves this summer, but all and all an except product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauria Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Just a Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic quality. I was kinda surprised it was this nice for the price. In addition to the thickness of the fabric there is a beefy double main compartment zipper which I hadn't seen before but is a great idea. There are plenty of sub pockets for compartmentalizing all of your stuff. I don't really have a need but there is a nice tablet sleeve as well. I use this to commute every day and just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

customer_reviews.title: Take care of Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: The Backpack is great! The material is very premium. It has a great space for everything. I can put my notebook without any troubbles. The only reason that I put 4 stars is the "water resistant". I know is not waterproof. But I got caught in a rainy day and when I opened it, my things was a little wet. After a few minutes It wiped well, but is something to take care if you gonna buy this one. Despite of that, the backpack is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect SLENDER bag!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this backpack because it holds my laptop, amongst many other things. And the fact that it's so slim, lightweight, and slender, makes it even more awesome. The laptop compartment takes a bit getting used to, but once you do, it's not really a big issue. The laptop compartment is padded, but it could use more padding at the bottom. All in all, I really appreciate that this bag is not bulky and still gets the job done like any other laptop backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Erica P.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price/value/features
customer_reviews.text: Best travel bag I’ve ever owned - securely handles both my laptop and iPad Pro along with various power cords, notebook, eyeglass case, snacks etc. Plenty of pockets to organize the little bits. Comfortable to wear even when loaded up. Can’t beat the price. Read a lot of reviews of various backpacks and glad I went for this one.
customer_reviews.author: C Stewart

customer_reviews.title: slim but fits a lot
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with how much I can fit in this backpack while it stays slim. I tried two other packs that claimed a slim design but they were still pretty big. This bag is perfect for commuting and flying. I fit my 15" MacBook pro along with chargers, notebook, kindle, water bottle and plenty of other room for odds and ends. Probably two small for an overnight bag but that's not what I wanted it for. Clean, minimalist design is nice without a bunch of big logos or extraneous buckles and zippers.
customer_reviews.author: insematrix

customer_reviews.title: Good commuter bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack. Well designed and a slim profile, (I actually got a compliment about how thin the profile was...lol) Held all of my stuff easily with room to spare. The downside is there is nothing on the bottom of the bag to prevent damage if the bag is dropped or to help it stand up on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a professional backpack to use for work. I considered all the name brand products and ultimately selected this one for the reviews and price. I knew I would return it if it didn't work since it was cheap. I am so happy with my purchase and glad I took a chance. This is a simple yet professional backpack. It has tons of storage space but doesn't look like it. I like the additional safety features it has, such as a "lock" for the laptop pocket, and the side pockets. Great buy for anyone who is looking for affordable quality and doesn't care for name brand. I've already recommended this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic design, holds as much as significantly larger bags, with a sleek compact look
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and compact design, yet has internal pockets and storage capabilities of that of a much larger bag. This bookbag keeps the weight of your items close to your back, which puts you in complete control of the weight distribution. This design along with a sturdy build, no saggy bookbag, allows for a great look while remaining comfortable regardless of weight you are carrying. This is an early review, but as long as the material and functioning parts do not fail, I will be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for airport travel but it's also great for day to day use. I love all of the pockets in this backpack. The exterior is durable and I also love my purple color. It fits like a glove under airline seats. I love the straps and the extra handle on the top.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessJamieK01

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: The compartment sizes are perfect for storing my iPad Pro, MacBook Pro, Apple Magic Mouse, Apple Pencil, notebooks, spare batteries, passport and wallet when I'm travelling. The weight distribution is so perfect I hardly notice any weight at all. Its probably my most satisfying travelling bag so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Browne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality purple backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for price, nice and thick, perfect for travel, enough padding for laptop, except for the bottom portion (it’s a bit too thin), haven’t travel with it yet, but love everything about it, specially the inner pocket behind the strap (between your back and shoulder strap), it’s a perfect place for important docs where no one able to get to. Only complain is it’s a bit heavy than expected.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy on the shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the chance to use it for work yet (per stay at home orders) but I am so far very happy. I have been using a Targus backpack for work for the last 9 years. This backpack is so much lighter! I have neck and shoulder issue and I am hoping this will help. I love all the small compartments and having a designated pocket for my battery pack. Can’t wait to show it off once I am allowed to go back to work!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of this backpack. I'm a commuter and it's a great combination of capacity w/out being too large, and it's at a price that you can't bean . Holds my laptop, lunch, Kindle, and many other things when needed w/out a large profile. i've had it over a year and it's held up extremely well. So much so that I've gotten one for both of my sons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a balanced backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues finding a backpack that was durable, lightweight and comfortable to wear. This fit the bill nicely! Compartment for my iPad Pro 12.9", main compartment for my Canon 6D MII, storage for my accessories and a small compartment for memory cards, pens, iPad accessories and a charging port for my phone/iPad. I'm getting another one for work! Great backpack for me!
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Great commuter backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and organization. Doesn't hold as much as I'm used to, but that's good for me - I'm only carrying what I actually need now. Fits plenty, though! Two bottles (or in my case a bottle and an umbrella), my laptop, my writing portfolio, wireless mouse, power bank, all my cord charging cords, purse, and personal hygiene trinkets. I highly recommend this as a ladies' laptop commuting backpack!
customer_reviews.author: KristaT

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love that this backpack has a separate zippered compartment in the back to slip in my 13” MacBook Air. It’s compartments are cleverly designed to fit several books in the main compartment. I put my planner in the sleeved section in the main area. The front, smaller Compartment fits my pens and other odds and ends. The straps are comfortable as well. Highly recommend to any grad student!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side Up

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Really good bag. I love that it's not bulky. It's light in weight and you have to buy your own rechargeable battery pack to charge for phone. It has lots of room and I get from point A to B with my items in tact. Only flaw with this bag is that, the white piece to connect your USB cord, doesn't say in place for you to plug it in, you have to maybe adjust it if you need to. Other than that, it's minor compared to it's greatness. Plus when it rains, the bag isn't socked 😄
customer_reviews.author: Mskisses8

customer_reviews.title: Good bag to commute to school
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this to commute to school and it does its job in carrying my iPad (9.7in) and laptop (13in) along with other stuff to campus well. Has enough space to fit about 3 binders in the main compartment even with my iPad and laptop, and has a decent number of smaller compartments to store plenty of other things. Material of the bag is quite nice, but I would be careful in how you handle the bag if you're carrying heavy (~15lbs), since the stitching can possibly tear a little between the shoulder and the bag itself. Also there is no padding under the laptop compartment so place your backpack down gently and you'll be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this backpack. It seems quite sturdy and all the functions described in the advertisement appear to be "as advertised." I also really like that, despite feeling quite large and substantial (capable of carrying a weekend's worth of clothing, etc. along with a small lap top), airlines somehow consider it a "personal item" and not a carryon. Would definitely make this purchase again
customer_reviews.author: baper

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. Fits a surprising amount of stuff and is very comfortable for my daily commute which involves a good deal of walking. The "hidden compartment" is more useful than I expected and it has plenty of organizers in the pockets to keep your stuff where you want and not be searching for things in your bag. Still small enough to fit into my tiny work locker and it has nice zippers that can lock the bag itself too if you want even more security while walking around in crowds.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dowling

product_meta.title: kopack Computer Backpack 17 Inch Water Resistant/USB Port/Anti-Theft Slim Travel Laptop Back Pack for College School Business
feature_bullets: 【Slim Design & Super Organizer 】 Slim square outlook matches business-casual clothing perfectly. 17 slots offers you a fantastic experience. Say goodbye to dig around in bag, Every gadgets will be organized. Laptop compartment: 42.5*29cm /16.7*11.4“ holds 16 most 17" thin laptop NOTE: Measure your PC to judge if fit, Not fit for thick gaming-laptop

【Anti-theft Hidden Laptop Zone】 Separating type laptop compartment design (under the shoulder straps) hidden in the back of the backpack provides easy access to the laptop directly without showing your personal items in public; Zipper can be locked to D shape ring with your lock to keep laptop privacy. (Lock Not Included)

【Detachable USB Cable】 External USB port with charging cable is convenient to charge phone/tablet/other devices with your own power bank. Better for cleaning backpack, wont get usb rotted, replacing the cable by removing the built-in cable. (Power Bank Not Included)

【Anti Thief Dual Layer Zipper】 The anti-puncture 4 tooth zipper of the main compartment provides double anti-theft protection with lockable zipper provides super travel safety to you. Perfect for business trip/weekend getaway or heading to the office/school/home.

【Quality Material】 Upgraded fabric with excellent texture, featured with durable tear-resistant water resistant oxford for unexpected rain, wipe in 5 minutes, no mark left. High elasticity sponge padded shoulder straps and back offers extra back support and comfort.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,294 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
